title: Robert Jenrick – 2020 Comments on Joe Biden’s Election as US President
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Robert Jenrick, the Secretary of State for Housing, Communities and Local Government, on 7 November 2020.
content:
Congratulations to Joe Biden and Kamala Harris on your achievement.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
